alert.note: Alert for Chowan; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 8:21PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN PERQUIMANS AND SOUTHERN CHOWAN COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 820 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cape Colony, or 10 miles southwest of Hertford, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cape Colony around 825 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Light Nixon Fork, Saint Johns, Macedonia, Hancock, Yeopim Station, Somerset, and Drummond Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
